intro.narration: In the heart of a luxurious mansion, you find yourself bound and gagged, surrounded by the opulent belongings of the wealthy elite. A man in an expensive suit, your captor, leans against a grand piano, sipping scotch.

nodes.narration: The man smirks as he notices you struggling. The scent of aged whiskey fills the air. You strain against your bindings, feeling a sense of desperation.

choices.text: You continue to struggle, hoping to catch him off guard.
You feign ignorance, pretending not to know anything about their activities.
You offer to cooperate, promising valuable information in exchange for your freedom.
You attempt to slip out of your bindings unnoticed.

nodes.narration: The man considers your offer, his eyes narrowing as he contemplates the potential value of your information.

choices.text: You press the advantage, emphasizing the urgency and importance of your information.
You bluff, claiming to have information that would implicate him in criminal activities.
You backtrack on your offer, realizing it was a risky move.

nodes.narration: Your struggle is in vain, and the man tightens your bonds. The room grows cold as you realize you've made a mistake.
The man seems slightly less suspicious of you, perhaps seeing potential in your cooperation.
A deal is struck, and the man releases you from your bindings. You've gained valuable intelligence but at a cost.
The man laughs, revealing that you had no useful information to offer.
Regretting your hasty decision, you vow to be more careful next time.
Your attempt at escape is discovered. The man reacts with anger, tightening your bonds and threatening retribution.

endings.title: Game Over
endings.narration: Your mission ends in failure, and you are left with a growing sense of hopelessness.

endings.title: Mission Progress
endings.narration: You continue your mission, moving one step closer to uncovering the truth.
